Module com.vexed.vexed
Package com.comp2059.app.view

Class GameStageView

java.lang.Object
com.comp2059.app.view.GameStageView
public class GameStageView extends Object
This class draws the game stage by refreshing constantly to achieve the effect that the screen changes in real time.
Since:
19 November 2022
